data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Jan Boterberg awards St. Truidense a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Yuma Suzuki is on target to give St. Truidense a 1-0 advantage.
Great play from Pol Garcia to set up the goal.
Jan Boterberg signals a St. Truidense throw-in in Gent's half.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sint- Truiden.
Jan Boterberg awards the home team a throw-in.
Gent are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 7, In Sint- Truiden, Igor Plastun (Gent) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for St. Truidense at Staaien.
St. Truidense have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Vadis Odjidja of Gent gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a St. Truidense goal kick.
In the minute 10, Throw-in Gent.
Ball safe as Gent is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for St. Truidense in their own half.
In the minute 12, Gent awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jan Boterberg awards Gent a goal kick.
Jan Boterberg signals a free kick to Gent.
In the minute 16, Free kick Gent.
Roman Yaremchuk for Gent is whistled offside.
Jan Boterberg signals a free kick to St. Truidense in their own half.
In the minute 18, Gent awarded a free kick in their own half.
St. Truidense pushes forward through Keito Nakamura, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Gent capitalize from this throw-in deep inside St. Truidense's half?
In the minute 21, Free kick for Gent in the half of St. Truidense.
Jan Boterberg signals a free kick to St. Truidense in their own half.
Gent awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 24, Jan Boterberg waits before resuming play because Steve De Ridder for St. Truidense is still down.
St. Truidense's Steve De Ridder looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Free kick for St. Truidense in their own half.
In the minute 26, St. Truidense to take a throw-in in Gent territory.
Corner awarded to St. Truidense.
Ibrahima Sory Sankhon for St. Truidense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Gent at Staaien.
Can St. Truidense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gent's half?
Gent awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Gent in their own half.
Jan Boterberg signals a free kick to St. Truidense in their own half.
Gent's Roman Bezus has been booked in Sint- Truiden.
In the minute 31, Santiago Colombatto is booked for the home team.
Free kick for Gent in their own half.
Throw-in for Gent at Staaien.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for St. Truidense in their own half.
In Sint- Truiden a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Gent goal kick.
In the minute 37, Free kick for St. Truidense in the half of Gent.
Throw-in for St. Truidense in the half of Gent.
Gent awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, St. Truidense's Facundo Colidio gets in a shot on goal at Staaien. But the effort is unsuccessful.
St. Truidense have been awarded a corner by Jan Boterberg.
Throw-in Gent.
In the minute 41, Jan Boterberg signals a free kick to Gent in their own half.
Gent awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gent.
In the minute 43, Goal! Igor Plastun (Gent) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
Sven Kums instrumental with a fine assist.
Ball safe as St. Truidense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in high up the field for St. Truidense in Sint- Truiden.
Jan Boterberg awards the away team a throw-in.
Gent have been awarded a corner by Jan Boterberg.
In the minute 45, Gent surge into the attack at Staaien but Michael Ngadeuâ€™s header is off-target.
St. Truidense have a goal kick.
St. Truidense to take a throw-in in Gent territory.
In the minute 45, St. Truidense's Yuma Suzuki has run offside.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Staaien.
In the minute 46, Jan Boterberg signals a Gent throw-in in St. Truidense's half.
Gent have been awarded a corner by Jan Boterberg.
Gent's Roman Yaremchuk is whistled for offside at Staaien.
In the minute 48, In Sint- Truiden a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to St. Truidense.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sint- Truiden.
In the minute 50, Free kick St. Truidense.
Gent's Roman Bezus gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for St. Truidense at Staaien.
In the minute 53, Gent drives forward and Alessio Castro-Montes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Jan Boterberg signals a free kick to St. Truidense in their own half.
St. Truidense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Gent at Staaien.
Jan Boterberg signals a free kick to St. Truidense.
Can St. Truidense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gent's half?
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Gent in their own half.
St. Truidense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gent are coming forward and Laurent Depoitre gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 58, Jan Boterberg awards St. Truidense a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The home team replace Keito Nakamura with Seung-Woo Lee.
In the minute 60, Facundo Colidio puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
Igor Plastun is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Throw-in for Gent in the half of St. Truidense.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sint- Truiden.
Igor Plastun, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Dino Arslanagic is the substitute for Gent.
The away team have replaced Roman Bezus with Anderson Niangbo. This is the second substitution made today by Jess Thorup.
In the minute 64, Anderson Niangbo of Gent is pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gent have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Can Gent get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in St. Truidense's half?
Gent have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for St. Truidense at Staaien.
In the minute 66, Gent are pushing forward but Anderson Niangbo's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a St. Truidense goal kick.
Throw-in St. Truidense.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Gent in their own half.
Gent awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gent apply pressure and a brilliant heading opportunity is created for Roman Yaremchuk but the ball hits the post!
In the minute 70, Throw-in for St. Truidense in their own half.
Throw-in for St. Truidense in the half of Gent.
Goal kick for Gent at Staaien.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Gent close to the penalty box.
Jan Boterberg awards the home team a throw-in.
Jan Boterberg signals a free kick to St. Truidense in their own half.
In the minute 73, St. Truidense to take a throw-in in Gent territory.
Jan Boterberg signals a St. Truidense throw-in in Gent's half.
Free kick for Gent in their own half.
In the minute 75, Ball safe as Gent is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball safe as St. Truidense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kevin Muscat (St. Truidense) is making a second substitution, with Duckens Nazon replacing Yuma Suzuki.
In the minute 77, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Steve De Ridder for St. Truidense who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Jan Boterberg signals a free kick to Gent in their own half.
Kevin Muscat (St. Truidense) is making a third change, with Jhonny Lucas replacing the possibly injured Steve De Ridder.
In the minute 79, Jan Boterberg awards the away team a throw-in.
Jan Boterberg signals a free kick to Gent just outside St. Truidense's area.
Gent's Sven Kums misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 80, Jan Boterberg awards St. Truidense a goal kick.
Jess Thorup is making the team's third substitution at Staaien with Dylan Mbayo replacing Laurent Depoitre.
Gent are on the attack at Staaien, where Roman Yaremchuk is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
In the minute 82, Gent are coming forward and Dylan Mbayo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sint- Truiden.
St. Truidense needs to be cautious. Gent have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 82, Anderson Niangbo (Gent) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by St. Truidense defenders.
St. Truidense drive forward but Duckens Nazon is judged offside.
St. Truidense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, St. Truidense have been awarded a corner by Jan Boterberg.
Seung-Woo Lee gets his shot on target but fails to score for St. Truidense.
Free kick for Gent in their own half.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to St. Truidense.
Seung-Woo Lee of St. Truidense gets in a strike, but is off target.
Gent have a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Jan Boterberg signals a throw-in for St. Truidense, close to Gent's area.
Jhonny Lucas for St. Truidense drives towards goal at Staaien. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to St. Truidense.
In the minute 89, In Sint- Truiden St. Truidense drive forward through Ibrahima Sory Sankhon. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in Gent.
Jan Boterberg signals a free kick to Gent.
Throw-in for St. Truidense in their own half.
At Staaien the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Gent at Staaien.
Gent to take a throw-in in St. Truidense territory.
In Sint- Truiden St. Truidense attack through Duckens Nazon. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Gent goal kick.
Gent awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Facundo Colidio for St. Truidense has been booked by Jan Boterberg and receives a first yellow card.
